content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "arrow", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 9, "index": 25}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 28, "index": 32}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 25, "index": 37}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft an oak_slab, I need to craft oak_planks first. To do that, I need to move the oak_log from slot 41 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 9, "index": 25}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 28, "index": 32}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 25, "index": 37}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}]
thought: The oak_planks have been crafted. I will now move them into an empty slot (12) in the inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "arrow", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 9, "index": 25}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 28, "index": 32}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 25, "index": 37}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I will move the oak_planks back into the crafting grid to craft the oak_slab.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
